info.name: Fix Mouse Drag Comment Box Give Clipboard Facebook
info.description:
I Find when drag mouse over comment boxes it snapped the drag off and made hard to copy to Clipboard
Here the answer mainly but also partial more help would be welcome successful and is for 
Windows 10 Google Chrome or lower Windows Maybe
info.additionalInfo:
After an update to Google Chrome near end Year 2018
That Cause Problem of Mouse Drag Not Happen over Comment Boxes for Clipboard
By chance I found a code on stylus That 'Stops text-area from resizing' to do with comment boxes that overcame the problem
That code script was written in 2011 and not sure if intention was to fix the same problem way back then
Decide to make my own first stylish script with extra
Though is a work around for some area Like Top Comment Boxes and Fan Page Comment Boxes I be glad for a fixer as quite new to this one

Read the REM Line Info Also If Want to at the End of Code
The Idea is Most the Comment Box Are Removed Like One Top of Page and Ones in Fan Pages
But Comment Under Top One on Your Own Timeline or Friends Is Still there But Fixed So Copy Clipboard Mouse Drag Doesn't Break
Idea Is Switch this STYLISH Off When Want to Add Original Messenger Post or Fan Page one

Last Update 
27 DEC 2018 
04 JAN 2019
The Reply to Comment Boxes Had to Be Include as Now Show
Now All Comment Boxer are Not Show as Have Problem Some Icon in Comment Box Like Grammar as Talk about in REM Code

Like Not Show the Timeline Navigator the Bang Up and down on Your Head as Move Up and Down
And Not Show the Anchored Announcement at Top of Fan Page
And Similar the Pinned Post at Top of Fan Page
